caption.p:
Wet Stress (WS) for
Phytophthora ramorum
as modelled using CLIMEX with the CliMond dataset of historical climate normals centred on 1975. Where WS = 0, soil moisture does not limit the distribution of P. ramorum and where WS >0 wet stress is represented by a factor of 1000, with increasing limitation as WS increases.
Click here for additional data file.
